Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Somatic PTEN deletions and mutations were observed in sporadic breast , brain , prostate and kidney cancer cell lines and in several primary tumours such as endometrial carcinomas , malignant melanoma and thyroid tumours .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| sporadic breast cancer |
| brain cancer |
| prostate cancer |
| kidney cancer |
| endometrial carcinomas |
| malignant melanoma |
| thyroid tumours |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| sporadic breast cancer |
| brain cancer |
| prostate cancer |
| kidney cancer |
| endometrial carcinomas |
| malignant melanoma |

Note: "cell lines" and "primary tumours" are not diseases, but rather types of specimens that may contain diseases. Therefore, they have been excluded from the table.
